item.title: Selection for the admission to the Theoretical and Scientific Data Science PhD course - 2 Fellowships financed by Human Technopole Foundation
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Roberto Trotta

From: 27-02-2025 13:00
To: 23-05-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Selection for the admission to the Theoretical and Scientific Data Science PhD course - 2 Fellowships financed by Human Technopole Foundation - phd-tsds-HT-2025


Topics:


- Artificial Intelligence methods for spatial cancer biology

- Decoding Oncogenic Shock: Advanced Unsupervised Learning for Causal Pathway Reconstruction in Cancer


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale (da remoto) / Academic qualifications - written - interview (remotely) (03.06 - 04/06.06.2025)
